name: I WILL ALWAYS LOVE YOU
content: I would only be in your way
So I'll go' but I know
所以我将离去 但我知道
我每走一步都会想念你
And I will always love you
你 我亲爱的宝贝 呵
That is all I'm taking with me
就是我带走的唯一东西
我们都知道我不再是你需要的
And I will always love you
I hope life treats you kind
但最重要的是我祝愿你找到真爱
And I will always love you
你 我亲爱的 我爱你
